description:
The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship!  Unfortunately for Jonouchi, his next opponent is Sieg Lloyd, the dashing duelist who defeated both Haga and Ryuzaki in one turn!  Things may be bad for Jonouchi, but Kaiba has his hands full when all the rides in Kaiba Land go haywire! Can Kaiba find out who’s behind all the sabotages before the tournament is ruined?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jounouchi vs Jeek: Karei Naru Duel
城之内VSジーク華麗なる決闘[デュエル]
